description:
Section 73 application to allow for the variation of conditions 2 (DRAWING AND DOCUMENT NUMBERS) and 3 (MATERIALS) of planning permission ref: P2019/0406/S73 for 'Section 73 application for the removal/variation of condition 2 (Drawings and Details) of planning consent ref: P2015/2199/FUL. The proposed amendments comprise of: internal reconfiguration, external alterations and increase of building height by approximately 250mm', approved on 15/10/2019. The application seeks the following alterations:
(a) Creation of an external covered stepped entrance in the current location.
(b) Bin store re-orientated to allow the external staircase alterations
(c) Provide access on the north-west side of the elevations where a level threshold can be achieved with the existing street level. 
(d) An internal ramp at the rear of the unit will allow access to the lift and WC facilities (including disabled WC).
(e) Creation of vent openings on the west elevation in association with the internal plant room.
(f) Amend the previously approved composite aluminium cladding for a fibre cement cladding to overcome fire safety and combustibility issues.
